mapper.select: SELECT relation_id,check_id,invertory_id,goods_id,goods_name,goods_code,goods_unit,goods_spec,goods_barcode,goods_batch,storage_location_id,storage_location_code,invertory_amount,check_amount,different_amount,remark FROM t_check_item a WHERE a.check_id = #{checkId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY a.relation_id DESC
